moduleDescription: This module will help students to understand the concepts and practice of leadership and develop a better knowledge of public service. Students will be exposed to insights and best practices, with emphasis on the public service and learn the skills to develop into a capable leader. Students will learn to lead, anticipate the future, make decisions, know their bias, build teams, motivate, communicate, understand the public interest and become better leaders.
faculty: LEE KUAN YEW SCHOOL OF PUBLIC POLICY
department: LEE KUAN YEW SCHOOL OF PUBLIC POLICY
